name: Cyber Apocalypse (Nitro)
description:
https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/471463133/

Shoot zombies and get kills to upgrade your gun! Continue surviving the apocalypse and climb your way up to the leaderboard of top survivors!

================

➮ Climb the leaderboard to be known as one of the top survivors!

➮ Upgrade guns as you survive for longer!

➮ Music: The Wasteland - Ross Bugden

================

Note: The leaderboard might not be working right, if it works, please leave a comment saying so.
